item.title: blockreassurance - Change colors
item.description: blockreassurance - Change colors Details Component : blockreassurance Status : Approved Scenario : https://forge.prestashop.com/browse/TEST-552 Steps Step Description Expected result Click on the first color (icon color), change it and save The color should be changed in the back office Click on the second color (icon color), change it and save The color should be changed in the back office Save and check in the front office that the color is changed The color should be the new ones
